_header: In a glorious garden green / Saw I sitting a comely queen
Subjects: carols, political; Elizabeth of York, queen
_description: The White Rose; a political carol on Elizabeth, wife of Henry VII — two 7-line stanzas (aaaabbc) and 4-line repeated burden: ‘This day day dawes / This gentill day day dawes / this gentill day dawes / & I must home gone’

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
In a gloryus garden greneSawe I syttyng a comly
                    quene…
BLAdd5465.Last Lines:
…The lyly-whighte rose me thought I sawe& euyr she
                    sang
